para.text: For purposes of this subtitle, the term:
"Child development facility" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 7-2031(3).
"Community-based organization" or "CBO" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 38-271.01(1C).
"Early childhood development provider" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 38-271.01(1G).
"Subsidy" means supplemental payments made by the Mayor pursuant to § 4-404.01.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 1102 of Fiscal Year 2022 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-159, Aug. 23, 2021, 68 DCR 008602).
